name: The History Machine
overview: The History Machine by H. Collier Did you ever wonder what day of the week some great event in history took place, Anne Boleyn, for instance, went to the block in May 1536, having seen Katherine of Aragon suffer the same fate in January of that year. Or maybe you wondered about the battle of which every schoolboy knows the year, when Harold died with an arrow in his eye on the 14th of October 1066. Now all this info is at your fingertips!
